title: [Future Skins] More Egalitarian Fanservice!
body:
With the advent of the new Arcade Miss Fortune skin, it's time to make it known to Riot that we appreciate fanservicy skins for the guys too!

We want more Varus, Ruthless Pantheons, Pool Party Graves, Pentakill Mordekaisers, Viscero Xin Zhaos, Traditional Lee Sins!

Share here skin concepts you've seen around the web that you'd like Riot to take a look at.

I'll get the ball rolling with Battlebunny Talon, Adonis Garen and Pool Party Xin Zhao!

replies.body: Pool Part Xin Zhao... I've been waiting for that one, saw that picture somewhere and thought it was a great idea. I know Xin has a lot of skins, but jabbing a beach umbrella into other champions would be awesome! My husband mains Xin Zhao and wants that but he said, "it will never happen." Glad someone else agrees with us lol

I couldn't agree more. Glad the skin has so much support already!

That said, the skin is semi-canon already, in that Pool Party Xin can be vaguely seen in the background of Pool Party Ziggs.

When they make fanservice skins for any character, male of female, they are going to make them skins which would actually have fanservice appeal to a large number of fans, not the tiny (and creepy) portion that think crossdressing is attractive.
I'm afraid I don't understand what you're talking about. Crossdressing? Where did you get that from?

Battle bunny talon?  The dude is in a strapless dress, nylons, and women's ballet slippers.

I wouldn't put it past riot to make a crossdressing skin, Battle Bunny Talon and Rengar have received overwhelming support in their respective threads, but they received that support as humorous skins, not as attractive ones.

*shrug* It's not my place to judge. Also not the point of the thread, come to think of it. The idea is to demonstrate a support for fanservicy skins on male champs, not to debate whether people find this or that attractive or not.

did someone say fanservice skins?
http://i.imgur.com/M0B8Slul.jpg
Curious; Is battle bunny talon appealing to female base? I mean, does it actually count for a fanservice skin

I'm not part of the female base, so I can't answer for them. He doesn't appeal to me personally (I'm more into the Adonis Garen skin), but I can imagine someone out there finds Battlebunny Talon attractive (someone did go through all that trouble to make that image, after all).
I've seen this skin before and I treated it as a joke skin. Talon is the male equivalent of Riven, so it fits
